name: Solana
reason: The Currency of the Realm. Useful for taxes (gas), but represents the central inflation engine.

name: Jito Staked SOL
reason: State Bond + MEV extraction. Superior to raw SOL due to yield, but still a State derivative.

name: Marinade Staked SOL
reason: The original State Bond. Decentralized validator set, but fundamentally tied to SOL inflation.

name: Blaze Staked SOL
reason: State Bond directed towards decentralization. Same tariff class as other LSTs.

name: Sanctum Infinity
reason: A basket of State Bonds. Diversifies validator risk, but remains a derivative of the L1.

name: Helius Staked SOL
reason: State Bond supporting RPC infrastructure. Slightly more 'merit' than generic LSTs, but kept at parity.

name: daoSOL
reason: State Bond used for DAO treasury diversification.
